commit.message:
get_scos.adb (Skip_EOL): Fix error of mishandling end of line after complex condition.

2009-07-23  Robert Dewar  <dewar@adacore.com>

	* get_scos.adb (Skip_EOL): Fix error of mishandling end of line after
	complex condition.

From-SVN: r149975
